author: Animalogic
description:
The silent bear of the Andes, the spectacled bear is a monk-like giant of the hills. It has an ethereal aura, which has made it the inspiration for the cartoonishly friendly Paddington Bear. But despite it's ghostly presence, it's a real survivor who has adapted to life in one Earth's most unique ecosysystems: the paramo. Can our team find this elusive bear? Or will it just disappear like a mountain ghost?

Get your copy of "Strange Creatures" now! It’s filled with all the amazing animal facts and beautiful original illustrations that you’ve come to love from us. 📗🐾 Order here: http://bit.ly/animalogicbook
